description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会甘肃省代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as a delegate from Gansu Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会代表是中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的组成人员。
description.en: Deputies to the National People's Congress are members of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的主体民族，也是世界上人口最多的民族。
description.en: The majority ethnic group in China and the most populous ethnic group in the world.

description.zh-cn: 宋关昶籍贯为浙江绍兴，是绍兴人。
description.en: Song Guanchang's ancestral home is Shaoxing, Zhejiang, and he is a native of Shaoxing.

description.zh-cn: 宋关昶是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Song Guanchang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋关昶是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Song Guanchang is a political figure in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，宋关昶被选为甘肃省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会的代表。
description.en: In 2018, Song Guanchang was elected as a deputy from Gansu Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

position.en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 宋关昶的职务为全国人大代表。
description.en: Song Guanchang's title is Deputy to the National People's Congress.
